description: This file defines the ProductListingPage widget for a Flutter app, displaying a grid of books with filtering and search capabilities, integrating with CatalogProvider for state management.

classes.name: ProductListingPage
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a grid of books with search and filter features.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the product listing page, including app bar, loading indicator, and grid of book cards.
